name: Rolling Marbles Down The Hill
description:
Rolling Marbles Down The Hill is an amazing game featuring marbles rolling down from an isometric hill.
The game offers the users a chance to enjoy an extremely simple yet fun game featuring single touch controls so that everyone can enjoy it.

The gameplay is simple as you would be controlling a marble rolling down the hill one step at a time. You have to make sure that the marble doesn't hit any obstacle or fall down from the empty space. You can change the direction of its movement by tapping on the screen. when you touch the screen the marble will take its next step towards opposite direction.

You can also find helping powerups on your way down. You might find refilling crystals which would fill up any games on the hill that would be currently in front of you. Also you might find jumping trampoline with which you would be able to jump and skip the next tile. This can come in handy when you have a holo tile or a tree in front of you.

Enjoy the game and try to roll as low as possible.
